name: EucoLight
membership:
Liaison organisation with CENELEC TC 111X (Environment)
Member of the EPR Club
goal:
EucoLight is voice of European WEEE compliance schemes specialised in managing the collection and recycling of WEEE lighting; working to make the circular economy a reality for lighting products.

It objectives are as follows:
- To represent our members with other European bodies and trade associations.
- To enhance the regulatory framework for lighting waste and associated level playing field.
- To support the development of appropriate international standards.
- To provide guidance and support to its members.
- To assist in the realisation of ambitious recycling collection rates.
euInitiatives:
- Directive on waste electrical and electronic equipment (WEEE) and derived mandates
- Circular economy and related waste legislative package
- Extended producer responsibility requirements
- Improvement of waste market conditions
- Standardisation
- Plastics strategy
